message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. We can discuss further if you don't like it.
I think we can do better than that. How about we meet in the middle?
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more. Let's see if you agree.

I'm still willing to compromise, but I think I need a bit more to make it worth my while. Let's see if you'll budge.
I'm getting a bit frustrated with these lowball offers. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but don't think I'm going to go any higher!
I'm running out of time, Bob. I need a serious offer if you want to close the deal. Let's make it happen.
I'm not going to give in to your lowball offers anymore. You're going to have to make a serious counteroffer if you want to get anywhere with me.
This is my last serious offer, Bob. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need a decent share if I'm going to walk away from this deal.

I'm not going to give in at this point. You're going to have to take what you can get. I'm walking away from this deal.
